entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Restore fails if any workload is missing for any `TargetFramework`, even when it is not the one targetted by the build #35176
  • dotnet tool has a verbosity mode but it isn't silent in mode "quiet" #35173

Closed

  • Warning caused by EnableAOTAnalyzer points to IsAotCompatible #34505
  • [net7] Creating a cross-targeted `net7.0-ios` + `net6.0-ios` packages forces consumers to build with net7 workloads #30103

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Asp.Net FrameworkReference in BrowserRefresh #35190
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35185
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Adjust trim/aot warning messages #35186
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35150
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2261094 #35170
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add mac signing to the other fork of the code path #35168
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add DOTNET_LAUNCH_PROFILE environment when invoking dotnet run #35029
    untriaged, Area-CLI

Updated

  • [main] Update dotnet/runtime #35048
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Container Build: Add tar.gz (Docker Archive) file writing #35151
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Side by side workload manifests and garbage collection for file based installs #35106
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Avoid loading all types when invoking Hot Reload handlers, handle type load failures #35077
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Use Razor with renamed compiler DLLs #34928
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add test for PublishSingleFile+PublishAot #34948
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Update Verify.Xunit package version #35146
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
